# Assure & Analyze

This phase of the data life cycle involves conducing your final data quality checks ([Quality Assurance](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/equity-data-handbook/assure-analyze/qaqc.html)) and beginning your analyses steps ([Data Analysis](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/equity-data-handbook/assure-analyze/analysis.html)).
